code: import React from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import TagBox from'../../components/write/TagBox';import{changeField}from'../../modules/write';var TagBoxContainer=function TagBoxContainer(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var tags=useSelector(function(state){return state.write.tags;});var onChangeTags=function onChangeTags(nextTags){dispatch(changeField({key:'tags',value:nextTags}));};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(TagBox,{onChangeTags:onChangeTags,tags:tags});};export default TagBoxContainer;
